title: [Large-scale] AI-Integrated EFL Writing Education Course for Graduate Students: TPACK Application Based on PBL

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Academic English Writing Structure, TOEFL iBT 90+ or Equivalent English Proficiency
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environments utilizing digital devices (tablets/laptops), supplemented by GPT-3.5-based AI writing tools.

learning_goals: Improvement of logical structuring skills using GPT-3.5 when writing academic paper abstracts and introductions (over 90% of learners can incorporate three-stage feedback)
Cultivation of the ability to judge the accuracy and appropriateness of academic expressions through AI-generated text analysis (achieving over 80% accuracy in final evaluations)

Learners can integrate ≥3 peer feedbacks via AI tools (Grammarly, ChatGPT) in a 4-week collaborative PBL project, document feedback implementation with a checklist, perform ≥2 real-time improvement cycles, and meet ≥4/5 rubric criteria in the final output.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
